mobile.name: shadow guardian
mobile.long_description: A shadow guardian screams a challenge and attacks.
mobile.description: It seems to be made of nothing more than darkness...

mobile.name: adventurer
mobile.long_description: An emaciated adventurer is here looking lost and hopeless.
mobile.description: He looks haggard and sickly; no doubt he's been lost here for quite some time.

mobile.name: edgar
mobile.long_description: Edgar the Human Swordpupil is standing here, looking quite lost.
mobile.description:
Edgar says 'pardon me, can you tell me where to buy cups?'
You see before you, one of Midgaard's finest fighting elite, the mighty bunny slayer himself, Edgar the Horrible!

mobile.name: diamond golem
mobile.long_description: A huge diamond golem is standing guard here.
mobile.description: It looks quite strong.

mobile.name: mage young
mobile.long_description: A young mage wanders about, oblivious to all.
mobile.description: He seems to be contemplating life, love and the mysteries of the universe. Then again, he may just have a headache.

mobile.name: strick bartender
mobile.long_description: Strick is here levitating drinks to his customers.
mobile.description: He looks rather harmless, but then again so does a sleeping dragon.

mobile.name: tatorious wizard
mobile.long_description: Tatorious the wizard is here counting his earnings.
mobile.description: Tatorious winks at you mischievously.

mobile.name: ezmerelda cook
mobile.long_description: Ezmerelda the cook is here stirring a large pot of something.
mobile.description: She does not look like the typical cook you would find in a kitchen, but she certainly fits what you would expect in a tower fulls of mages.

mobile.name: assistant mage cook
mobile.long_description: The cook's assistant is here assisting the cook.
mobile.description: This young man is busy adding strange ingredients to the large pot.

mobile.name: prisoner
mobile.long_description: A prisoner is chained to the wall here.
mobile.description:
Though his clothes are all in rags, you can see that at one time they must have been fine garments. A metal muzzle has been fitted over the poor wretch's mouth, whether to keep him from screaming, or to silence his spell casting you cannot tell.
He looks quite mad, no doubt he has been mistreated horribly.

mobile.name: jailor mage
mobile.long_description: The Jailor is here enjoying a comfortable nap.
mobile.description: He looks rather dirty.

mobile.name: broom
mobile.long_description: A straw broom is here leaning against the wall.
mobile.description: The broom screams 'Take that you lout!'

mobile.name: lesser guardian hands
mobile.long_description: A pair of disembodied hands floats in the air here.
mobile.description: The hands twitch with anticipation of strangling someone.

mobile.name: guardian greater eyes
mobile.long_description: A pair of disembodied eyes floats here glaring at you.
mobile.description: The eyes smoulder with hatred.

mobile.name: mage visitor
mobile.long_description: A visiting mage is here snoring away in peaceful slumber.
mobile.description: He looks quite sleepy.

mobile.name: apprentice young
mobile.long_description: A young apprentice magic user is here doing magical studies.
mobile.description: She looks quite intent on her studies.

mobile.name: apprentice young
mobile.long_description: A young apprentice is here mumbling words of magic to himself.
mobile.description: He looks to be oblivious to all but the spell he is memorizing.

mobile.name: apprentice young
mobile.long_description: A young apprentice is sleeping here.
mobile.description: He seems to be dreaming.

mobile.name: apprentice young
mobile.long_description: A young apprentice is here teasing a cornered kitten.
mobile.description: He looks like a mischievous youth.

mobile.name: kitten
mobile.long_description: A small kitten is here meowing in terror.
mobile.description: The little ball of fur looks very unhappy. Singed fur and a few minor burns mark its mottled coat.

mobile.name: student
mobile.long_description: A student of spells is here looking quite bored.
mobile.description: The student yawns.

mobile.name: instructor teacher mage
mobile.long_description: The instructor screams at your interruption and attacks you.
mobile.description: He looks quite angry at your interruption.

mobile.name: student
mobile.long_description: A student of spells is here trying to master invisibility.
mobile.description: He blinks in and out of existence, trying to master the spell.

mobile.name: teacher mage
mobile.long_description: A spell teacher screams at your interruption and attacks.
mobile.description: The teacher is quite fierce and rather frightening.

mobile.name: student
mobile.long_description: A student of spells has fallen asleep at her desk here.
mobile.description: She looks to have collapsed from sheer boredom.

mobile.name: wizard speaker mage
mobile.long_description: An old wizard is here making a speech here.
mobile.description: This wizzened old man looks like he could easily pass for the oldest living man. Of course, having heard stories about some of the magic available to the people living here, and what toll the magic draws... this man might be as young as you.

mobile.name: mage young
mobile.long_description: A young mage is here learning hand to hand combat.
mobile.description: This young fellow looks quite confident in his abilities to defend himself.

mobile.name: mistress battle
mobile.long_description: The battle mistress is here teaching the fine uses of a dagger.
mobile.description: She looks quite rugged. In fact, she more resembles a warrior than a magic user.

mobile.name: mage teacher
mobile.long_description: A spell teacher is here relaxing.
mobile.description: The teacher looks to be worn out by a long day of magic working, difficult spells, and inattentive students.

mobile.name: wizard
mobile.long_description: An aged wizard is sleeping here.
mobile.description: Dreams of magic and power are probably flowing through his head right now, better not wake him up.

mobile.name: scribe mage
mobile.long_description: A scribe is here working on some manuscripts.
mobile.description: He appears to be copying out some spell ingredients or components right now.

mobile.name: scribe mage
mobile.long_description: A scribe is here working diligently on some translations.
mobile.description: She is quite cute. Too bad her only interest seems to be the words of lore she is translating.

mobile.name: master scribe
mobile.long_description: The Master Scribe is here looking a little upset
mobile.description: He seems to be so old, his skin has become nothing but a giant wrinkle. The master scribe screams 'How dare you interrupt my important work???'

mobile.name: assistant scribe
mobile.long_description: The scribe's assistant is here folding parchments.
mobile.description: You can tell that he isn't trusted with the more important documents, since those ones are rolled and sealed with wax.

mobile.name: master enchanter mage
mobile.long_description: The Enchanter is here placing a dweomer upon well made sword.
mobile.description: The Enchanter is hard at work, concentrating on a spell which could either destroy the weapon or make it many times more powerful than it already is.

mobile.name: sword dancing
mobile.long_description: A well crafted sword lies on the work table here.
mobile.description: It looks quite sharp.

mobile.name: alchemist
mobile.long_description: The Mad Alchemist babbles something incomprehensible and attacks.
mobile.description:
He looks like he has been quaffing too many potions. His eyes dart around wildly, and he starts to drool.
The Mad Alchemist throws back his head and cackles with insane glee!

mobile.name: master summoner
mobile.long_description: The Master Summoner is here holding gateways open to other planes.
mobile.description: The Summoner looks to be hard at work, concentrating on keeping control over the gateway before he loses his soul to the creatures on the other side of it.

mobile.name: master charmer
mobile.long_description: The Master Charmer utters the words, 'uuuzzldctz'.
mobile.description: The Master Charmer sizes you up, always looking for a new pet.

mobile.name: golem wooden
mobile.long_description: A wooden golem stands a silent vigil here, guarding the stairs.
mobile.description: He looks flammable.

mobile.name: master spellbinder
mobile.long_description: The Master Spellbinder is here re-charging a blackened wand.
mobile.description: The Master Spellbinder snarls at you and attacks.

mobile.name: master maker
mobile.long_description: The Golem Maker is here chiseling some stone.
mobile.description: The Golem Master appears to be very meticulous about his work, to the point of fussing over it.

mobile.name: golem granite
mobile.long_description: A granite golem stands here waiting to do its master's bidding.
mobile.description: It looks like a statue, until you see it shamble towards you.

mobile.name: golem bronze
mobile.long_description: A bronze golem stands here shining in the light.
mobile.description: He looks rather dim witted.

mobile.name: golem flesh
mobile.long_description: A flesh golem stands guard here
mobile.description: It looks to be made of a potpourri of different body parts; some don't even resemble anything human.

mobile.name: golem cloth
mobile.long_description: A cloth golem wanders around here.
mobile.description: It looks like a bunch of old rags, quite surprising it can actually walk.

mobile.name: golem adamantite
mobile.long_description: An adamantite golem stands here looking very dangerous.
mobile.description: It seems to be forged of dark metal. It looks strong and durable, but somewhat un-intelligent.

mobile.name: golem clay
mobile.long_description: A clay golem stands guard here.
mobile.description: This large golem almost looks like it is made of dirt.

mobile.name: master illusionist mage dragon
mobile.long_description: An enormous multi-colored three-headed dragon growls at you.
mobile.description: The image of an ugly dragon flickers slightly, and where the dragon was now stands a small harmless looking old man.

mobile.name: necromancer master
mobile.long_description: The Necromancer is here raising undead servants.
mobile.description: Attired all in black, the Necromancer is tall and gangly, but still quite an imposing figure. A dark cowl shrouds most of his face, but two blazing embers which serve as eyes can be seen through the shadow. The Necromancer shrieks some obscenities and orders his minions to attack.

mobile.name: skeleton undead
mobile.long_description: An animated skeleton screams silently and attacks.
mobile.description: It feels no pain, and hacks at you ruthlessly.

mobile.name: undead giant
mobile.long_description: An undead giant lumbers towards you.
mobile.description: This thing seems to be the reanimated corpse of a giant, creating an enormous zombie.

mobile.name: witch hag
mobile.long_description: An ugly witch is here scrying out secrets.
mobile.description: She has no face at all, just blank skin, rather disturbing. From about where her mouth should be, comes a disgusting giggling sound that makes your skin crawl with revulsion.

mobile.name: librarian mage
mobile.long_description: The Librarian has fallen asleep at his desk here.
mobile.description: He looks like a rather peaceful old man.

mobile.name: apprentice
mobile.long_description: The Master's apprentice leaps to halt your passage.
mobile.description: A powerful wizard in his own right, the apprentice of the master of balance has given up his station in the mage guild hierarchy in order to serve the Great Master in hopes of gleaning secrets one could never hope to uncover alone.

mobile.name: cat grey familiar
mobile.long_description: A grey cat is lounging lazily here.
mobile.description: The grey cat cocks an ear towards you, sensing your scrutiny, then purrs contentedly. It looks rather harmless, until you notice its very large claws.

mobile.name: master guildmaster grey
mobile.long_description: The Master of Neutrality is here contemplating the balance of the Universe.
mobile.description: He looks quite peaceful.

mobile.name: apprentice black
mobile.long_description: A black robed apprentice jumps from the shadows and attacks.
mobile.description: She bears a wicked looking scar down the side of her face, though once she must have been beautiful, now the scar combined with what seems to be a permanent scowl make her looks quite fearsome.

mobile.name: cat black familiar
mobile.long_description: A black cat with its fur up hisses at you.
mobile.description: It looks both mean and dangerous. Petting seems to be completely out of the question.

mobile.name: master guildmaster black
mobile.short_description: the Master of the Black Robes
mobile.long_description: The Master of the Black Robes is here plotting vile deeds.
mobile.description: The Master glares at you.

mobile.name: apprentice white
mobile.long_description: A white robed apprentice screams at your desecration of goodness.
mobile.description: He looks like a fanatic. The white robed apprentice screams 'Thou art unworthy of this honour!'

mobile.name: cat white familiar
mobile.long_description: A white cat is here preening its fur.
mobile.description: It seems to be nothing more than a large ball of fluff with claws.

mobile.name: master guildmaster white
mobile.long_description: The Master of Goodness is here frowning at your intrusion.
mobile.description: He looks like a self-righteous bastard.

mobile.name: cat calico familiar
mobile.long_description: A large calico cat is lounging about here.
mobile.description: It looks incredibly large for a cat, no doubt a giant of its species. A beautiful jewel encrusted collar about its neck is its only adornment.

mobile.name: guildmaster grand mistress
mobile.long_description: The Grand Mistress of Magic is sitting here.
mobile.description: She looks quite comfortable on her emerald throne. Amazingly young and pretty for one of such stature in the guild, no doubt she has kept her youthful appearance through the use of strong magics. The Grand Mistress pets her familiar and smiles at you in confidence.
